title: Assistant keeps randomly and erratically triggering on Pixel 4 XL
content: Google Assistant keeps randomly triggering and acting erratically on my Pixel 4XL. At first I thought something was wrong with the Active Edge, so I turned off "squeeze to activate Assistant" but the issue continued. I then tried turning off Assistant on the phone. Active Edge is working fine to silence calls, etc, and Assistant no longer keeps popping up. So, I am assuming it is a Google Assistant software issue. Anyone else experiencing this?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
